compass.name: Compass
compass.description: An old needle compass that still holds north.

map_fragment.name: Map Fragment
map_fragment.description: A torn map showing a few quiet corridors.

patrol_jacket.name: Patrol Jacket
patrol_jacket.description: A perimeter-issued jacket with reinforced seams.

signal_hoodie.name: Signal Hoodie
signal_hoodie.description: A soft hoodie with stitched signal markers along the cuff.

protocol_deciphered.name: Deciphered Protocol
protocol_deciphered.description: The original frequency patterns, now fully understood. It is a bridge between the city and the silence.

camp_kit.name: Camp Kit
camp_kit.description: A light bundle for resting outdoors.

battery_cell.name: Battery Cell
battery_cell.description: A compact power cell for scanners and receivers.

multitool.name: Multitool
multitool.description: Fold-out pliers and blades for quick fixes.

apple.name: Ration Bar
apple.description: A compact calorie bar for quick energy.

coveralls.name: Coveralls
coveralls.description: One-piece coveralls stained with honest work.

patrol_boots.name: Patrol Boots
patrol_boots.description: Heavy-duty boots with muted tread for perimeter work.

utility_jacket.name: Utility Jacket
utility_jacket.description: A rugged jacket with quiet snaps and deep pockets.

rain_shell.name: Rain Shell
rain_shell.description: A water-shedding shell that crackles softly with every step.

med_patch.name: Med Patch
med_patch.description: A quick-seal patch infused with coagulant.

broadcast_protocol.name: Broadcast Protocol
broadcast_protocol.description: A fragile data drive salvaged from the spire. Its signal could lead the sleepers home.

trail_boots.name: Trail Boots
trail_boots.description: Quiet-soled boots built for long routes beyond the walls.

sneakers.name: Sneakers
sneakers.description: Light, quiet sneakers with worn soles.

note_card.name: Note Card
note_card.description: A laminated card for logging routes and supplies.

track_pants.name: Track Pants
track_pants.description: Soft athletic pants that move quietly.

keycard.name: Keycard
keycard.description: A low-clearance card for doors and log terminals.

club.name: Signal Baton
club.description: A weighted baton tuned to knock and tap without harm.

medical_coat.name: Medical Coat
medical_coat.description: A clean coat marked with clinic patches and a pen loop.

bandage_roll.name: Bandage Roll
bandage_roll.description: Flexible wrap for sprains and cuts.

lockpick_set.name: Lockpick Set
lockpick_set.description: Slim picks and a tension wrench in a soft sleeve.

patrol_pants.name: Patrol Pants
patrol_pants.description: Tough pants with reinforced knees and stitched unit marks.

radio_receiver.name: Radio Receiver
radio_receiver.description: A compact receiver tuned for low-frequency drift pings.

watch_cap.name: Watch Cap
watch_cap.description: A low-profile patrol cap favored by perimeter watchers.

work_pants.name: Work Pants
work_pants.description: Hard-wearing trousers built for hauling and lifting.

cargo_pants.name: Cargo Pants
cargo_pants.description: Durable pants with quiet pockets and reinforced knees.

ball_cap.name: Ball Cap
ball_cap.description: A faded cap with a curved brim and a stitched logo long worn smooth.

surgical_cap.name: Surgical Cap
surgical_cap.description: A sterile cap that keeps hair out of the clinic's clean zone.

slacks.name: Slacks
slacks.description: Clean, quiet slacks favored by clerks and planners.

tool_pouch.name: Tool Pouch
tool_pouch.description: A canvas pouch with loops for small tools.

potion.name: Antiseptic Ampoule
potion.description: A sealed dose that eases fever and stabilizes wounds.

sewing_kit.name: Sewing Kit
sewing_kit.description: Needle, thread, and a few spare buttons.

signal_chalk.name: Signal Chalk
signal_chalk.description: Dusty sticks used to mark quiet routes and safe doors.

ancient_relic.name: Ancient Relic
ancient_relic.description: A pulsing obsidian cube pulsing with a low, rhythmic frequency.

glow_stick.name: Glow Stick
glow_stick.description: Low-light marker that lasts a few hours.

denim_jacket.name: Denim Jacket
denim_jacket.description: A reinforced jacket with patched elbows and a worn collar.

water_flask.name: Water Flask
water_flask.description: A dented flask with a silent cap and clean seal.

clinic_shoes.name: Clinic Shoes
clinic_shoes.description: Slip-resistant shoes built for long clinic shifts.

antiseptic_wipe.name: Antiseptic Wipe
antiseptic_wipe.description: Single-use cloth for cleaning wounds and tools.

knit_cap.name: Knit Cap
knit_cap.description: A warm, close-knit cap that keeps noise-raisers out of your ears.

supply_apron.name: Supply Apron
supply_apron.description: A heavy canvas apron that keeps ration dust off your clothes.

archivist_coat.name: Archivist Coat
archivist_coat.description: A long, quiet coat lined with pockets for data logs.

ration_pack.name: Ration Pack
ration_pack.description: Sealed meal bricks meant to keep you steady and quiet.

work_boots.name: Work Boots
work_boots.description: Sturdy boots that keep your footing on rusted stairs.

sword.name: Utility Pry Bar
sword.description: A solid metal bar for lifting panels and opening jammed doors.

logistics_coat.name: Logistics Coat
logistics_coat.description: A tailored coat with colored tabs for resource priority levels.

scrap_parts.name: Scrap Parts
scrap_parts.description: Mixed fasteners, wire, and salvageable fittings.

bandana.name: Bandana
bandana.description: A triangular scarf that can be tied for sweat, dust, or anonymity.

protein_bar.name: Protein Bar
protein_bar.description: A dense, chalky bar that keeps you moving.

rubber_boots.name: Rubber Boots
rubber_boots.description: Waterproof boots for docks and flood zones.

faye.name: Faye
faye.description: Manages the rationed cots and the only filtered-air room in the district.
faye.label: CHAR__faye__talk

theo.name: Theo
theo.description: Dedicated to preserving pre-fall data logs and charting the decay of the global transmission grid.
theo.label: CHAR__theo__talk

nia.name: Nia
nia.description: A sharp-eyed orphan who navigates the crawlspaces and service tunnels to avoid the 'Sleeper' drifts.
nia.label: CHAR__nia__talk

hakim.name: Hakim
hakim.description: Manages the settlement's ration crates, medical supplies, and barter ledgers.
hakim.label: CHAR__hakim__talk

clerk.name: Clerk
clerk.description: A no-nonsense clerk who manages the official settlement exchange and logbooks.
clerk.label: CHAR__clerk__talk

greta.name: Greta
greta.description: Keeps the shelter's alarms, air filtration, and signal rigs working with scrap-tech.
greta.label: CHAR__greta__talk

lena.name: Lena
lena.description: A veteran scout who reads the perimeter drifts like a topography map.
lena.label: CHAR__lena__talk

mara.name: Mara
mara.description: The steady hand keeping the settlement's life-support and quarantine running.
mara.label: CHAR__mara__talk

jace.name: Jace
jace.description: A lookout at the rusted harbor who watches for 'Drifter' anomalies in the fog.
jace.label: CHAR__jace__talk

ash.name: Ash
ash.description: A quiet survivor who claims to have walked from the Dead Zones without a signal baton.
ash.label: CHAR__ash__talk

rafi.name: Rafi
rafi.description: The firm voice at the quarantine gate, ensuring no 'Drift' enters the settlement.
rafi.label: CHAR__rafi__talk

imani.name: Imani
imani.description: A high-level policy lead tracking route safety, ration efficiency, and drift probability.
imani.label: CHAR__imani__talk

kael.name: Kael
kael.description: A high-risk courier who uses kinetic force to clear 'Sleeper' blockades.
kael.label: CHAR__kael__talk

survivor.name: Survivor
survivor.description: A veteran of the Dead Zones who can hear the rhythm of the Silence.
survivor.label: CHAR__survivor__talk

jun.name: Jun
jun.description: A calm voice who keeps the shelter steady with rhythmic cadence and signal-dampening tones.
jun.label: CHAR__jun__talk

elena.name: Elena
elena.description: A high-tension combat medic who specializes in frequency-induced trauma and Sleeper-bite stabilization.
elena.label: CHAR__elena__talk

home.name: Safehouse
home.description: A quiet multi-level safehouse assigned to you within the quarantine block.

home#attic.name: Attic
home#attic.description: A cramped attic full of stored crates and old insulation.

home#top-floor.name: Top Floor
home#top-floor.description: Quiet sleeping quarters and the bathroom.

home#top-floor#main-bedroom.name: Main Bedroom
home#top-floor#main-bedroom.description: Your assigned room with a narrow cot and a small mirror.

entities.name: Cot
entities.description: A narrow cot with a clean blanket.
entities.label: LOC__home__bed

entities.name: Small Mirror
entities.description: Check your face and move on.
entities.label: LOC__home__mirror

entities.name: Supply Locker
entities.description: A battered locker for your essentials.

home#top-floor#guest-bedroom.name: Guest Bedroom
home#top-floor#guest-bedroom.description: A spare room kept ready for visitors or injured runners.

home#top-floor#kids-bedroom.name: Kids Bedroom
home#top-floor#kids-bedroom.description: A small room with mismatched blankets and hand-drawn maps.

home#top-floor#bathroom.name: Bathroom
home#top-floor#bathroom.description: A compact washroom with a trickling filter line.

home#main-floor.name: Main Floor
home#main-floor.description: The day-to-day living space, with work areas and a garage.

home#main-floor#garage.name: Garage
home#main-floor#garage.description: A converted bay for carts, tools, and quiet repairs.

home#main-floor#kitchen.name: Kitchen
home#main-floor#kitchen.description: A narrow galley for ration prep and shared meals.

home#main-floor#living-room.name: Living Room
home#main-floor#living-room.description: A low-lit common area with patched couches and old screens.

home#main-floor#office.name: Office
home#main-floor#office.description: A cramped desk space for logs, maps, and comms.

home#basement.name: Basement
home#basement.description: Utility space with old ducting and supply cages.

home#basement#furnace-room.name: Furnace Room
home#basement#furnace-room.description: The heat hub, lined with filters and rumbling vents.

home#basement#supply-room.name: Supply Room
home#basement#supply-room.description: Locked shelves of spare parts and emergency stocks.

market.name: Relief Exchange
market.description: Lines of crates and a steady flow of supplies.

entities.name: Signal Console
entities.description: A cracked screen with a faint repeating tone.
entities.label: test_minigame

docks.name: Quarantine Docks
docks.description: Silent piers and a distant, empty harbor.

tavern.name: Shelter Hall
tavern.description: Cots, quiet songs, and a warm meal if you're lucky.

forest_edge.name: Outskirts Line
forest_edge.description: The fence line where the city thins into overgrowth and silent lots.

city_center.name: Civic Hub
city_center.description: A sandbagged plaza with radios and posted routes.

temple.name: Dawn Clinic
temple.description: Clean sheets, soft lights, and careful hands.

guardhouse.name: Quarantine Gate
guardhouse.description: Checkpoint lights, logbooks, and a tight line of rules.

mage_tower_f1.name: Broadcast Tower Lobby
mage_tower_f1.description: Dusty consoles and a sealed control room.

entities.name: Signal Console
entities.description: A flickering screen covered in grime. It hums with a steady rhythm.
entities.label: console_interaction

shop.name: Supply Depot
shop.description: Shelves of ration tins and repair tools.

mage_tower.name: Broadcast Tower
mage_tower.description: A concrete spire that once blanketed the city with signal.

iron_and_fire.name: Tools and Fire
iron_and_fire.description: Mechanic Greta needs materials to build non-lethal tools and alarms.

theo_secret.name: Patient Zero
theo_secret.description: Theo is searching for the first record of the sleepers.

formal_intro.name: Chain of Command
formal_intro.description: Meet the leaders keeping the district steady.

long_dawn.name: The Long Dawn
long_dawn.description: Track the Spire's shifting signal and protect the settlement through calm, non-violent guidance.

silent_tide.name: The Silent Tide
silent_tide.description: Follow the sleepers' rhythm to craft a non-violent way to guide them away from the city.

infected.name: The Infected
infected.description: The drifted and sleep-walked—drawn to resonance, dangerous in swarms, but not mindless.

remnant_government.name: Remnant Government
remnant_government.description: A thin, centralized authority clinging to protocols, radios, and old-world order.

field_meds.name: Field Medics
field_meds.description: Healthcare crews managing triage, quarantine care, and frequency-related trauma.

supply_union.name: Supply Union
supply_union.description: Ration runners, quartermasters, and salvage crews keeping the settlement stocked.

perimeter_watch.name: Perimeter Watch
perimeter_watch.description: The quiet line of patrols, checkpoints, and scouts who keep the sleepers out.

lena_ask_for_a_guide.long: I could use a scout who knows the frequency dead-spots. Walk with me.
lena_ask_for_a_guide.label: CHOICE__lena_ask_for_a_guide

lena_ask_to_part_ways.long: Head back to the settlement. I'll handle the rest of this signal run.
lena_ask_to_part_ways.label: CHOICE__lena_ask_to_part_ways

mara_offer_help.long: If you need someone to run the outskirts, I'm your person.
mara_offer_help.label: CHOICE__mara_offer_help

mara_ask_about_the_signal.long: What's the latest on the Spire's transmission?
mara_ask_about_the_signal.label: CHOICE__mara_ask_about_the_signal

mara_report_on_spire.long: I have the protocol drive from the Spire.
mara_report_on_spire.cond: flag_get('protocol_recovered', False) and not flag_get('protocol_deciphered', False)
mara_report_on_spire.label: CHOICE__mara_report_on_spire

rafi_request_gate_pass.long: I need a clearance pass for the Dead Zone fence. (Requires Charisma 10)
rafi_request_gate_pass.label: CHOICE__rafi_request_gate_pass

rafi_report_a_quiet_route.long: I've mapped a path with significantly lower Sleeper density.
rafi_report_a_quiet_route.label: CHOICE__rafi_report_a_quiet_route

kael_ask_about_breaching.long: How do you clear a block of Sleepers?
kael_ask_about_breaching.label: CHOICE__kael_ask_about_breaching

jun_learn_cadence.long: Teach me a dampening signal pattern to keep the sleepers at bay.
jun_learn_cadence.label: CHOICE__jun_learn_cadence

elena_checkup.long: I've been hearing a low hum... can you check my resonance levels?
elena_checkup.label: CHOICE__elena_checkup

general_store.name: Relief Depot
general_store.description: The main distribution point for rations and repair kits.

first_steps.name: First Steps
first_steps.description: Begin your adventure in the world

flu.name: Feverish
flu.description: Shaky hands and a foggy head.
